DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate addition two different probiotic intervention comprehensive behavioral lifestyle intervention body weight loss overall health overweight adult .
DOC.brief_title: The Influence Probiotics Body Weight Composition
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blinded , placebo-controlled study . After obtain informed consent , healthy overweight adult age 18 75 year ( n=76/intervention group n=228 total/study ) randomize one three group : Lactobacillus , blend Bifidobacterium Lactobacillus , placebo . Participants consume 1 capsule per day probiotic placebo 12 week . Participants attend weekly behavioral lifestyle intervention meeting , address dietary physical activity contribution weight loss , group approximately 20 subject 12 intervention week . Participants complete daily questionnaire throughout week intervention period address subject compliance bowel habit . A dual X-ray absorptivity scan do measure body composition week intervention 12th week intervention period ( ± 1 week ) . Blood sample collect via finger prick baseline final time point . Blood sample use measure cardiovascular metabolic marker health . Stool sample collect 25 subject per intervention group week intervention period 12th week intervention period . Dietary intake assess week intervention period week final appointment ( ± 1 week ) . Gastrointestinal symptoms physical activity questionnaire complete upon provide consent study , randomize intervention , last week intervention period . Questionnaires regard income , weight control strategy , quality life complete randomization last week intervention period . Stool sample collect subgroup participant week intervention period 12th week intervention period . These sample use detect presence and/or abundance and/or survival probiotic microorganism end digestive tract .
DOC.criteria: To participate study must : Be age 18 75 year Have BMI ≥ 25 Be willing receive random assignment probiotic placebo supplementation Be willing able complete Informed Consent Form English Be willing complete questionnaire , record , diary associate study complete study visit Be commit lose weight 12week study period Be willing discontinue consumption ferment food probiotic ( e.g. , yogurt live , active culture supplement ) . Be willing provide social security number ( SS # ) receive study payment ? Note : subject still participate unwilling provide SS # , financial reimbursement provide . To participate study must NOT : Have use another investigational product within 3 month enrol study Be pregnant breastfeed plan become pregnant next 18 month Be allergic milk , soy , yeast Have gain lose least 10 lbs previous 3 month Have uncontrolled angina ( severe chest pain ) within past 6 month Have insulindependent diabetes ( oral medication exclusionary ) Use weightloss medication Have cancer treatment ( radiation , chemotherapy , surgery ) within past 6 month treatment condition know weaken immune system ( e.g. , systemic corticosteroid HIV/AIDS ) Be currently treat follow physiciandiagnosed disease condition : inflammatory bowel disease , celiac disease , short bowel syndrome , malabsorptive syndrome ? Have physical condition deem likely significantly interfere ability participate lifestyle intervention involve eat physical activity change Be currently participate Weight Watcher 's another weight loss program
